extendedInfo.description: D-Measures Free has evolved into D-Photo Measures Free. Thisis the free version of the D-Photo Measure application with ads. If you decide to purchase the full version, data of the free version can be imported.This powerfull application let's you draw measures and dimensions on a photo. After photos are marked up with measurements, they can be send to anyone, or exported to the media gallery. Remember that a picture is worth a thousand words.An indispensible tool for construction workers, engineers, architects, carpenters, real estate agents, auction sellers, ...Warning: This application doesn't work on some Android 4 (Ice Cream Sandwish) devices. This issue will be addressed in the next release.------------- Sketch -------------- Use a photo from the media library of your phone or take a new photo with the camera.- Dimension arrows: 5 types.- Angles- Text boxes to point out details.- Draw free-hand annotations.- Metric and imperial units: m, cm, mm, yd, ft, in and ft-in.- Different colors for arrows, angles and text boxes. Use the color that's the most visible on the picture or use a specific color for specific purposes.- Graphical indication of the dimension that will be moved, edited or erased.------------- Organize -------------- Custom photo names.By default, the photos are named for the current date and time. Long-press the photo to pop up the context menu that allows you to rename the photo.- Folders.Organize your drawings to folders to keep an overview by project, customer or location.------------- Share -------------- Share full size photos with measures and dimensions.- Share multiple drawings and folders with one click.

reviews.title: Very handy
reviews.comment: Easy to use
reviews.author: Roy De Giglio

reviews.title: Too buggy
reviews.comment: Even more primitive, than it\'s competitors - no automated measurements, annotations only. Crashed 10+ times during 2h use. Sometimes loads project for 30+ seconds. Thumbnails disappear time to time. New photos got damaged even before you start to edit them in 20% cases.
reviews.author: Igor Varfolomeev

reviews.title: Always crashes, lost dimensions
reviews.comment: Unreliable,  i just use \"draw on photo\"  now
reviews.author: Niko K

reviews.title: So far so good
reviews.comment: Will re rate later
reviews.author: Frank DeSimone

reviews.title: Very useful and convenient tool.
reviews.comment: Basic version is free has simple features that works really well
reviews.author: eddie pan

reviews.title: Crashed my phone
reviews.comment: BAD, very bad app. It crashed my SGS2 on the first use, second measurement and then again on exporting a photo. (Android 4.1.2 XWLSS)

reviews.title: Very Pleased
reviews.comment: Impressed with the free features. Need more time to evaluate, but this just may be a sign surveyers dream time saver for measuring sign areas.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app I love it!

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Although filed to take a picture, I had to use an image from my photos gallery.

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: It is the handiest measurment apparently I have found

reviews.title: Excellent.
reviews.comment: Superb. Very clever and very convenient.

reviews.comment: Its slow

reviews.comment: Great

reviews.title: No Rotate?
reviews.comment: Its a basic image handling requirement in my opinion...and appears to be missing.
reviews.author: Nighthawk McKenzie

reviews.title: Quick & handy
reviews.comment: Used this to do a quick angle measure on a photo of a building project. Worked great & app is very intuitive.
reviews.author: Tom Burry

reviews.title: Useful
reviews.comment: When I bought my house I used this app to record the measurements/dimensions of the rooms. Was very helpful when out shopping and I needed to know measurements. Very easy to use and figure out.
reviews.author: Karie Norman

reviews.title: Great app, force closes however
reviews.comment: If I try to take a pic within the app it will force close on me. So I can only load photos. Would be 5 otherwise. Excellent idea!
reviews.author: Nick Bishop

reviews.title: Very useful
reviews.comment: Its very useful. Lol. I am a stair builder and it makes my job so much easier.
reviews.author: Eric Stalvey

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: It is good to make the measure. Easy to do.
